languages.text: {n}Ксеносу явно стало комфортнее — сонливое оцепенение, вызванное низкой температурой, сменилось вальяжной медлительностью авторитетного вожака.{/n}
{n}The xenos is clearly more comfortable now — the sleepy torpor induced by the low temperature has been replaced with the languid ease of an undisputed leader in his element.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ксеносу явно стало комфортнее — сонливое оцепенение, вызванное низкой температурой, сменилось вальяжной медлительностью авторитетного вожака.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is clearly more comfortable now — the sleepy torpor induced by the low temperature has been replaced with the languid ease of an undisputed leader in his element.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is clearly more comfortable now — the sleepy torpor induced by the low temperature has been replaced with the languid ease of an undisputed leader in his element.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}很明显，这个异形的表情变得更加愉悦。原本由于低温引起的困倦已经荡然无存，他的动作也变得更加慵懒，更加轻松。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is clearly more comfortable now — the sleepy torpor induced by the low temperature has been replaced with the languid ease of an undisputed leader in his element.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很明显，这个异形的表情变得更加愉悦。原本由于低温引起的困倦已经荡然无存，他的动作也变得更加慵懒，更加轻松。{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}El xenos está visiblemente más cómodo ahora. El torpor somnoliento causado por la baja temperatura ha dado paso a la tranquilidad de un líder en su elemento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is clearly more comfortable now — the sleepy torpor induced by the low temperature has been replaced with the languid ease of an undisputed leader in his element.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos está visiblemente más cómodo ahora. El torpor somnoliento causado por la baja temperatura ha dado paso a la tranquilidad de un líder en su elemento.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}異種族は以前より明らかにくつろいでいる。気温の低さで眠気を誘われていた表情は、本拠地で満足げに休息をとっている統率者のようなものに変化した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is clearly more comfortable now — the sleepy torpor induced by the low temperature has been replaced with the languid ease of an undisputed leader in his element.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は以前より明らかにくつろいでいる。気温の低さで眠気を誘われていた表情は、本拠地で満足げに休息をとっている統率者のようなものに変化した。{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos fühlt sich nun offenkundig wohler — die schläfrige Trägheit, die durch die niedrigen Temperaturen ausgelöst wurde, ist der entspannten Ruhe eines unangefochtenen Anführers gewichen, der völlig in s einem Element ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is clearly more comfortable now — the sleepy torpor induced by the low temperature has been replaced with the languid ease of an undisputed leader in his element.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos fühlt sich nun offenkundig wohler — die schläfrige Trägheit, die durch die niedrigen Temperaturen ausgelöst wurde, ist der entspannten Ruhe eines unangefochtenen Anführers gewichen, der völlig in s einem Element ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Le xénos se sent manifestement plus à l'aise : la torpeur causée par le froid a laissé place à la décontraction d'un chef indiscutablement dans son élément.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is clearly more comfortable now — the sleepy torpor induced by the low temperature has been replaced with the languid ease of an undisputed leader in his element.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos se sent manifestement plus à l'aise : la torpeur causée par le froid a laissé place à la décontraction d'un chef indiscutablement dans son élément.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Zenonun sıkıntısından âdeta eser kalmamış. Düşük sıcaklığın etkisiyle girdiği uykulu uyuşukluk hâli, yerini rakipsiz bir liderlerde sıklıkla görülen rahatlığa bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is clearly more comfortable now — the sleepy torpor induced by the low temperature has been replaced with the languid ease of an undisputed leader in his element.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zenonun sıkıntısından âdeta eser kalmamış. Düşük sıcaklığın etkisiyle girdiği uykulu uyuşukluk hâli yerini, rakipsiz bir liderin doğal ortamında gösterdiği rahatlığa bırakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger
